errors_found: Soliton mass: claimed 1682 GeV, calculated 8418.1 GeV
Direct detection: σ_SI = 1.624e-47 cm² exceeds LZ bound 1.000e-47 cm²
warnings: §12 geometric argument is not rigorous. The claim that 'geodesic distance ratio on SU(3) gives 1/√3' is stated without proof. The projection from 3D stella octangula to 2D SU(3) weight space needs explicit derivation.

§4.2 uses M_W = (6π²/e) v_W, which differs from standard Skyrme formula M = (12π²/e²) f. The document sets e=1 without justification. Standard Skyrme with e=5.45 gives M_W ≈ 567 GeV, very different from claimed 1682 GeV. This discrepancy needs explanation.

§13 boundary overlap integral formula is stated without derivation. The integral ∫_{∂D_W} P_W(x)·P_RGB(x) dA needs to be explicitly evaluated to verify the claimed result. The choice ε = 0.5 is also not justified.

§6.4 'geometric derivation' of ε_W is not rigorous. The document lists three geometric factors (VEV ratio, domain solid angle) but then applies an additional 'mass-dependent suppression' factor without clear justification. The claim that ε_W ∝ m_p/M_W needs proper derivation from baryogenesis mechanism.
§6 ADM mechanism assumes symmetric component annihilates efficiently. This requires ⟨σv⟩ >> H(T) at freeze-out. Document should verify this condition explicitly with the claimed λ_HΦ = 0.036.
suggestions: §12: Provide rigorous derivation of v_W = v_H/√3 from SU(3) geometry
§4.2: Clarify relationship between custom formula M_W = (6π²/e)v_W and standard Skyrme formula
§13: Explicitly evaluate boundary overlap integral to verify λ_HΦ ≈ 0.036
§6.4: Derive ε_W from baryogenesis mechanism, showing mass-dependent suppression
§6.5: Verify that ⟨σv⟩ >> H(T) at freeze-out for efficient annihilation
Add explicit dimensional analysis section to document
Cross-check all numerical values with independent calculation

sigma_SI.formula: σ_SI = (λ_HΦ² f_N² μ_N² m_N²) / (π m_h⁴ M_W²)
